title: AGRICULTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.

At least 'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject

title: ANIMAL HEALTH & PRODUCTION TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, a basic science and three (3) other subjects chosen from the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics is compulsory.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Geography, Physics, Economics or Chemistry.

title: ENVIRONMENTAL HEALTH TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Biology/Health Science and any three (3) from the following: Nutrition, Chemistry, Physics, Religious Studies, Geography, Economics, Nigerian Language Plus at least a pass in English Language, Food and Nutrition/Home Management.

title: FISHERIES TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science and two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and Economics

title: PRODUCTION TECH.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.

At least 'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject

title: SCIENCE LABORATORY TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and two (2) of Physics,

Biology/Agricultural Science/Health Science, Chemistry,

and two (2) other subjects from Technical Drawing, Metal or Wood Work, Basic Electricity, Geography, Further Mathematics, and Fine Arts.

'O' Level credit pass in each of the three (3) Basic Science subjects - Biology, Chemistry, Physics and a 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is compulsory.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science or Physics

title: VETERINARY LABORATORY TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics,

Biology/Agricultural Science/Health Science, Chemistry and any other subject.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Agricultural Science or Mathematics.
